fields.summary: Shake Gesture is not working in modal window

comments.body: Please provide a simple runnable test case so that we can diagnose the issue. Also, we need your environment information (OS / Titanium SDK/CLI/Studio version).
Resolving this issue as invalid as we have not received requested information from the reporter.
